main event: Multiple reports of unidentified aerial objects were observed in Petersburg, Florida, between 5-20 November 1964.
interesting points: Sightings included both USAF and civilian observations occurring simultaneously,The objects appeared to be drifting or gliding with no visible propellers,One witness reported seeing a bright object that was distinct from other tracked objects on radar,The objects were tracked on radar for approximately 2 to 3 minutes,The report indicated that the unidentified object was confirmed not to be an airplane and could not be identified as a satellite.
witness description: A resident of Pinellas County, Florida, who reported seeing a bright object.
